homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.meta-description: Crofloor is a website for luxury wooden flooring. You can find and buy the most beautiful wooden parquet flooring options and even make your own.

about-section.heading: Our motivation
about-section.description: As a manufacturer, we are committed to ensuring consistent quality and continuous improvement of our products, as well as following global trends. All parquets in out range are carefully designed and manufactured from the highest quality materials to meet the requirements of users in terms of durability, resistance, and safety. They are the perfect choice for all those who want to install lasting quality in their home or business space. Two-layer and three-layer parquets are suitable for laying on underfloor heating, which further contributes to the comfort of living in your house or apartment.
